OM_Karlach_COM.synopsis: Karlach meets Lann at MOO and he offers her three soul coins as long as she hears the stories of their souls.
OM_Karlach_COM.how_to_trigger: 1. Recruit Karlach as companion.2. Speak with Lann with her nearby.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Karlach meets Lann at MOO and he offers her three soul coins as long as she hears the stories of their souls.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: 1. Recruit Karlach as companion.2. Speak with Lann as Karlach with no one around.OR1. Recruit Karlach as avatar.2. Speak with Lann with her.

OM_Karlach_COM_17.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_17.text: Well. Flo didn't tell a lie. She said you'd find me, and here you are. Karlach, isn't it?

OM_Karlach_COM_33.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_33.text: Now there's a name I'd hoped never to hear again. What was Flo doing here?

OM_Karlach_COM_42.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_42.text: Didn't think to quiz her about her business.

OM_Karlach_COM_18.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_18.text: Florenta the Garrotter. A cambion I knew back in Avernus.

OM_Karlach_COM_73.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_73.text: She was the closest thing I had to a friend. That said, she would've choked the life out of me if I ever turned my back on her.

OM_Karlach_COM_57.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_57.text: That fact that she knows where I am - where I might be going - doesn't exactly delight me.

OM_Karlach_COM_89.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_89.text: Maybe. Probably. I don't know. She's a half-devil. Impossible to read.

OM_Karlach_COM_76.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_76.text: If she rears her head, we'll handle her.

OM_Karlach_COM_25.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_25.text: Let's hope it doesn't come to that. What did she want, anyway?
OM_Karlach_COM_25.context: NodeContext: 'What did she want anyway' is directed to the NPC

OM_Karlach_COM_20.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_20.text: She came dressed as a novice. Gave me three soul coins. Said I could sell 'em if I wanted, but if I kept 'em for you, she'd consider it a favour owed.

OM_Karlach_COM_62.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_62.text: Soul coins, huh? Those could come in handy.

OM_Karlach_COM_49.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_49.text: Let's have the soul coins, then.

OM_Karlach_COM_3.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_3.text: 'Fraid they're all gone. Should've come around sooner.

OM_Karlach_COM_27.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_27.text: You can take a look at my other wares, if you like. Won't entice Flo into my debt, but I'm always looking for wielders worthy of my stock.

OM_Karlach_COM_99.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_99.text: Did Flo have anything else for us?

OM_Karlach_COM_9.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_9.text: A shit-eating grin. Oh, and uh. This. That's it.

OM_Karlach_COM_77.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_77.text: Sure. But she did have a condition.
OM_Karlach_COM_77.context: NodeContext: A condition before Karlach can have the soul coins

OM_Karlach_COM_13.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_13.text: For every coin you take, you've got to hear the story of the soul trapped inside.

OM_Karlach_COM_90.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_90.text: There you have it. Flo came all this way just to try to make me feel like shit. Clever use of her time.

OM_Karlach_COM_60.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_60.text: Memorised a bunch of sad stories on her behalf, did you?

OM_Karlach_COM_7.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_7.text: Didn't need to. Your Flo did some devil woo-woo and stuck 'em in my head. Couldn't forget now if I wanted to.

OM_Karlach_COM_8.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_8.text: D'you want the coins or not?

OM_Karlach_COM_56.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_56.text: Fine. Get on with it, then.

OM_Karlach_COM_95.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_95.text: First coin's got the soul of a woman named Mavery.
OM_Karlach_COM_95.context: NodeContext: MAH- vur-ee. Only here so pronounce it however you want.

OM_Karlach_COM_65.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_65.text: She was born to a cruel mother and a violent father and three evil brothers, all named Baldur.

OM_Karlach_COM_93.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_93.text: She never knew a day of love in all her life. When she was a girl of fifteen, she sold her soul to Tiamat in exchange for someone who would love her unconditionally.

OM_Karlach_COM_15.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_15.text: She got what she asked for. A fellow named Clint, destined to be her soul mate. Struck by a cart and died a few moments after clapping eyes on our Mavery. Poor guy.

OM_Karlach_COM_50.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_50.text: The scud of her soul is yours, now.

OM_Karlach_COM_97.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_97.context: NodeContext: A bit chastened but still with a hard edge.

OM_Karlach_COM_21.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_21.text: We'll put that coin to better use than Tiamat would've.

OM_Karlach_COM_72.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_72.text: This'n has got the soul of a man named Frakes. Lived in a village near Neverwinter, hit hard by the worst hunger in a thousand years.

OM_Karlach_COM_22.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_22.text: Frakes called out for help - prayed for his children to have meat to eat.

OM_Karlach_COM_84.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_84.text: Zariel answered. Made old Frakes grow flesh upon flesh after flesh. His wee ones had all the meat they could stomach.

OM_Karlach_COM_34.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_34.text: He should've known. Better to die a thousand deaths than let Zariel into your life.

OM_Karlach_COM_98.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_98.text: We'll put his coin to good use. He'll help us rid the Realms of people like Zariel.

OM_Karlach_COM_46.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_46.text: Whatever you need to tell yourself.

OM_Karlach_COM_70.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_70.text: I'd tell you another, but I'm afraid those are the only coins I've got for you. You should've come around sooner while I still had all three.

OM_Karlach_COM_61.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_61.text: Last one's got the soul of a little boy named Ongir. Eight years old. He liked playing in the sun with his friends. That's all I know.
OM_Karlach_COM_61.context: NodeContext: ON-geer but it's a one-off so do it your way

OM_Karlach_COM_12.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_12.context: NodeContext: A little sadly while maintaining her tough exterior

OM_Karlach_COM_88.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_88.text: That's all. Oh. And this slip of scratch.

OM_Karlach_COM_31.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_31.text: Well thanks, Flo. Hearing a bunch of desperate horror has ruined my day, which I suppose was the point.

OM_Karlach_COM_39.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_39.text: You got three soul coins out of the bargain, didn't you? I'd quit whinging if I were you.

OM_Karlach_COM_47.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_47.text: I did my part. That means our business is done, unless you've got actual gold to hand.

OM_Karlach_COM_36.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_36.text: Better hope you can handle what I've got.

OM_Karlach_COM_51.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_51.text: That's absolutely vile. Unsurprising of Zariel, but vile all the same.

OM_Karlach_COM_86.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_86.text: Karlach's the one set to consume his soul, I hear.
OM_Karlach_COM_86.context: NodeContext: A little accusatory, emphasis on 'youre'

OM_Karlach_COM_52.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_52.text: I'd tell you another, but I'm afraid that's the only coin I've got for you. You should've come around sooner while I still had all three.

OM_Karlach_COM_83.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_83.text: No - we're not playing her little game.

OM_Karlach_COM_94.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_94.text: She said Karlach might say that. And she said to let her have it her own way.

OM_Karlach_COM_40.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_40.text: You can take a look at the rest of my lot, if you like. Got good weapons in search of a worthy wielder.

OM_Karlach_COM_79.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_79.text: What do you want soul coins for?

OM_Karlach_COM_24.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_24.text: I'll explain later - away from prying ears. But trust me - you'll be into it.
OM_Karlach_COM_24.context: NodeContext: Referring to why she wants to collect soul coins

OM_Karlach_COM_37.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_37.text: Infernal currency - each one is inscribed with a soul. Usually an evil soul, but... not always.
OM_Karlach_COM_37.context: NodeContext: A little sheepish on the 'not always' since Karlach consumes soul coins

OM_Karlach_COM_58.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_58.text: We shouldn't take anything offered by a devil. Too risky.

OM_Karlach_COM_6.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_6.text: Cambion. But you're right. Then again... they could really come in handy.

OM_Karlach_COM_59.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_59.text: Pfft. All right. Suit yourself. Have a trade or whatever. Then let's get out of here.
OM_Karlach_COM_59.context: NodeContext: Player is being dismissive of her.

OM_Karlach_COM_67.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_67.text: Soul coins, huh? I know this is odd, but I could make good use of those. Might as well take 'em, while they're on offer.

OM_Karlach_COM_0.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_0.text: What does she want with you?

OM_Karlach_COM_82.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_82.text: Nothing would surprise me. Maybe she wants to live up to her name and wrap a cord around my neck. Or maybe she just wants to say hello.

OM_Karlach_COM_80.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_80.text: I wouldn't have given her the time of day, but even I needed a laugh once in a while. And what can I say, the bitch had good jokes.

OM_Karlach_COM_63.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_63.text: Enough chatter. Your friend gave me three soul coins. Said I could sell 'em if I wanted, but if I kept 'em for you, she'd consider it a favour owed.

OM_Karlach_COM_64.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_64.text: What did this person want with Karlach?

OM_Karlach_COM_68.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_68.text: She came dressed as a novice. Gave me three soul coins. Said I could sell 'em if I wanted, but if I kept 'em for your friend, she'd consider it a favour owed.

OM_Karlach_COM_4.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_4.text: Enough - I want to trade, not chat.

OM_Karlach_COM_92.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_92.context: NodeContext: A bit put out cause the player is short-cutting an origin moment.

OM_Karlach_COM_75.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_COM_75.text: I've got all sorts on offer, if you're worthy of 'em.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_68.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_68.text: Well. Flo didn't tell a lie. She said you'd find me, and here you are. Karlach, isn't it?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_87.speaker: Narrator
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_87.text: *Memories flood back of a cambion named Florenta you knew in the Hells. The closest thing you had to a friend.*

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_15.text: Didn't think to quiz her about her business.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_15.context: NodeContext: Laden with sarcasm; of course he isn't going to quiz a cambion.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_80.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_80.text: She came dressed as a novice. Gave me three soul coins. Said I could sell 'em if I wanted, but if I kept 'em for you, she'd consider it a favour owed.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_40.text: Let's have the soul coins, then.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_91.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_91.text: 'Fraid they're all gone. Should've come around sooner.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_83.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_83.text: You can take a look at my other wares, if you like. Won't entice Flo into my debt, but I'm always looking for wielders worthy of my stock.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_52.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_52.text: Did Flo have anything else for me?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_3.text: A shit-eating grin. Oh, and uh. This. That's it.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_106.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_106.text: Sure. But she did have a condition.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_106.context: NodeContext: A condition before Karlach can have the soul coins

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_54.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_54.text: For every coin you take, you've got to hear the story of the soul trapped inside.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_23.text: Fine. Get on with it, then.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_10.text: First coin's got the soul of a woman named Mavery.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_10.context: NodeContext: MAH- vur-ee. Only here so pronounce it however you want.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_43.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_43.text: She was born to a cruel mother and a violent father and three evil brothers, all named Baldur.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_73.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_73.text: She never knew a day of love in all her life. When she was a girl of fifteen, she sold her soul to Tiamat in exchange for someone who would love her unconditionally.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_37.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_37.text: She got what she asked for. A fellow named Clint, destined to be her soul mate. Struck by a cart and died a few moments after clapping eyes on our Mavery. Poor guy.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_17.text: The scud of her soul is yours, now.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_7.text: Thanks. I'll put it to better use than Tiamat would have.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_51.text: This'n has got the soul of a man named Frakes. Lived in a village near Neverwinter, hit hard by the worst hunger in a thousand years.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_78.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_78.text: Frakes called out for help - prayed for his children to have meat to eat.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_63.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_63.text: Zariel answered. Made old Frakes grow flesh upon flesh after flesh. His wee ones had all the meat they could stomach.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_108.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_108.text: I'll put his coin to good use. He'll help me rid the Realms of people like Zariel.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_49.text: Whatever you need to tell yourself, woman.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_0.text: I'd tell you another, but I'm afraid those are the only coins I've got for you. You should've come around sooner while I still had all three.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_79.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_79.text: Last one's got the soul of a little boy named Ongir. Eight years old. He liked playing in the sun with his friends. That's all I know.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_79.context: NodeContext: ON-geer but it's a one-off so do it your way

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_14.text: Thanks, Flo. Hearing all these stories has ruined my day, which I suppose was the point.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_88.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_88.text: You got three soul coins out of the bargain, didn't you? I'd quit whinging if I were you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_110.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_110.text: I did my part. That means our business is done, unless you've got actual gold to hand.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_9.text: That's it. Oh. And this slip of scratch. And now we're done.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_36.text: That cambion friend of yours went through a lot of trouble to get you them coins.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_74.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_74.text: That's absolutely vile. Unsurprising of Zariel, but vile all the same.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_11.text: You're the one set to consume his soul, I hear.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_11.context: NodeContext: A little accusatory, emphasis on 'youre'

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_69.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_69.text: I'd tell you another, but I'm afraid that's the only coin I've got for you. You should've come around sooner while I still had all three.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_111.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_111.text: Flo is such a rotten arsehole.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_116.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_116.text: That's between you and her. Do you want the coins or not?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_95.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_95.text: Didn't need to. Your one Flo did some devil woo-woo and stuck 'em in my head. Couldn't forget now if I wanted to.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_96.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_96.text: No - I'm not playing her little game.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_100.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_100.text: She said you might say that. And she said to let you have it your own way.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_28.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_28.text: You can take a look at the rest of my lot, if you like. Got good weapons in search of a worthy wielder.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_19.text: Now why would she do a thing like that?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_35.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_35.text: You know what devilfolk are like. No point trying to guess at why they do anything.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_94.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_94.text: I'm not falling for one of her little games. No thanks.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_13.text: What'd she tell you about me?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_58.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_58.text: Told me to look out for a one-horned tiefling with an infernal engine blazing out of her chest.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_57.text: Then she handed me three soul coins. Said I could sell 'em if I wanted, but if I kept 'em for you, she'd consider it a favour owed.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_56.text: I don't want to hear another word about her or any other devil.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_55.text: Suit yourself. Then you won't want to know what she left you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_29.text: Whatever it is will be laden with strings attached. No thanks.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_67.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_67.text: Ugh. Go on, then. What is it?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_93.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_93.text: She gave me three soul coins. Said I could sell 'em if I wanted, but if I kept 'em for you, she'd consider it a favour owed.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_70.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_70.text: Flo?! What was she doing here?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_44.text: I'm positive there's a catch here, but... go on. Let's see the coins.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Lann Tarv
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_21.text: We won't be here much longer. Just waiting for the word to march. Better stock up while you can.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_32.text: Incredible. Flo must be livid I got out of Avernus. Wants to drag me back to the Hells with a few horror stories. All right. Go ahead.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_32.context: NodeContext: With a bit of a sneer. 'Flo' wasn't really her friend. More like Q and Picard.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_30.text: Thanks. I'll put it to better use than Tiamat would have.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_2.text: That's absolutely vile. Unsurprising of Zariel, but vile all the same.
